Create a final tibble holding parameters for cluster markers heatmaps generation.

Source: R/cluster_markers.R
cluster_markers_heatmaps_df_fn.Rd

Compared to the cluster_markers_heatmap_params target, the output tibble is expanded to each marker test type etc.

Usage

cluster_markers_heatmaps_df_fn(
  cluster_markers_processed,
  cluster_markers_heatmap_params,
  out_dir
)

Arguments

cluster_markers_processed

(input target) A tibble.

cluster_markers_heatmap_params

(input target) A tibble.

out_dir

A character scalar: path to output directory for heatmap PDFs.

Value

A tibble. Output target: cluster_markers_heatmaps_df

On this page

Developed by Jiri Novotny, Jan Kubovciak, Lucie Pfeiferova, Michal Kolar.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.

Using preferably template.
